name: Imperial Mandate
passive: Coordinated Fire: Abilities that slow or immobilize a champion mark them. Ally damage detonates the mark, dealing bonus damage and granting both of you Movement Speed.
description: Item that provides Ability Power, Health, Ability Haste, Ability Haste. Passive effect: Abilities that slow or immobilize a champion mark them. Ally damage detonates the mark, dealing bonus damage and granting both of you Movement Speed.. Perfect for frontline champions who need to absorb damage.
tips: Excellent for frontline champions who need to absorb damage
Build this when facing heavy mixed damage compositions
The resistances help you survive longer in team fights
Provides unique utility that can change fight dynamics
The active/passive effect creates opportunities for your team
